name: Fight To Destroy Communism
description:
Fight To Destroy Communism (FTDC) is a 2D platformer created using the Unity Tilemap System! Traverse levels as you avoid spikes, climb ladders, and strike the commies where it hurts! FTDC provides a variety of characters, each with their own unique abilities! Want a tank that can take a beating? Or a healer? An all out war machine? Or even just a character that's fully balanced! We have it all, just press "E" to change characters, and embark on your adventure!

Background: 

I wanted to try my hands at a platformer and I decided to use the same storyline as my previous game (Da Boys). It is a small summer projected created using pre-made assets. I wanted to learn the elements of what went into a platformer, so I began the project. It is unpolished, therefore I don't regard it a finished game, however, as I was able to code all the platforming mechanics myself, I am satisfied with it.
